segments.text: The kitchen cabinets are open, revealing that big cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing higher on the stool to get at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's shaking; he might topple any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, waiting patiently with her hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over at the sink, water gushes out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman keeps drying her plate, unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron will be soaked soon from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly, but the puddle threatens them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how a fall could break everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad that such a nice day inside is turning messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children look excited, but it's not worth the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be watching them instead of the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between in and out is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
